thread.title: BRIEF-Cambridge Analytica Says Did Not Share Any GSR Data With AIQ

title: BRIEF-Cambridge Analytica Says Did Not Share Any GSR Data With AIQ
text: March 27, 2018 / 10:58 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Cambridge Analytica Says Did Not Share Any GSR Data With AIQ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 27 (Reuters) - Facebook Inc: * CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA SAYS ENGAGED ALEKSANDR KOGAN “IN GOOD FAITH, AND DELETED HIS COMPANY’S DATA ONCE WE KNEW WE HAD TO” - TWEET * CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA SAYS A FURTHER INDEPENDENT AUDIT ALONGSIDE REGULATORY INVESTIGATIONS WILL “CONFIRM THIS ONCE AND FOR ALL” - TWEET * CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA SAYS DID NOT SHARE ANY GSR DATA WITH AGGREGATEIQ; “WE HAVEN’T HAD ANY COMMUNICATION WITH AIQ SINCE DECEMBER 2015” - TWEET Further company coverage:
